Today was the big day for you. You were finally going to become a volunteer shrinky for the Advanced Science Society, or A.S.S as your friends called it. You never understood if they intentionally choose that acronym or if it was just an accident. Either way, you made your way over to one of their contacts and stopped them on their way to class.


"Hey. I heard from someone that you're part of the Advanced Science Society. Is that true?" You asked the girl as she looked blankly at you for a moment before replying.


"Yeah, that's true. Why do you ask?"


"Well, i was interested in becoming a shrinky." The girl seemed to light right up as she grabbed your hand before you could say another word and rushed off with you in tow to their secret hideout. You couldn't keep track of all the turns you had made on the way, what with how fast she seemed to move and all.


"Alright, just wait right here and I'll be right back." Then she rushed off to get someone to work the shrinking device. It didn't take long for her to return with another girl with long pink hair and blue eyes.


"So, you must be the new and future shrinky. I'm the Vice Director of the Advanced Science Society, you may simply call me that until i get to know you more personally." The Vice Director then led you into the device and handed you a small I.D. with your fact on it.


"This is your E Rank Membership Card. This let's other people know that you're one of our shrinky's, and that if anyone harms you intentionally, there will be hell to pay." She leads you to a strange lab. Once there you see a girl with blue hair done up in long twin ponytails. "Can I help you?" she asks. "Yes, I'm looking for information about the disappearances." You reply.

"Oh I know about them, but the missing people are fine I assure you." she says, and then she explains "Well you see Chijinda we have created a device to shrink people so we can stop the planet from becoming over populated.
